name: Terapagos ex
author: 5ban Graphics
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.effect: If you go second, you can’t use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-{C} Pokémon.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
